meanings.definition: A person who runs short distances at a fast pace.
meanings.sent1: The sprinters raced to the finish line with great speed.
meanings.sent2: The sprinters trained hard to improve their speed for the race.
meanings.sent3: The sprinters challenged each other to a friendly race.
meanings.sent4: In the world of running, sprinters are like cheetahs on the track.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the sprinters for their quick and powerful strides.

meanings.definition: A group of athletes who specialize in running short distances at a fast pace.
meanings.sent1: The sprinters from different countries gathered for the championship.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the sprinters as they sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The sprinters celebrated their victory with a joyful dance.
meanings.sent4: The team of sprinters worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The stadium was filled with excitement as the sprinters prepared for the race.
